scripts.validate: npm run lint:md && npm run unreferenced:find
scripts.fix: npm run lint:md:fix && npm run unreferenced:fix
scripts.build: npm run build:guide && npm run build:ig && npm run build:env
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run manifests:fix && npm run build && cp tools/merge-markdown/merged/*.docx deliverables && cp tools/merge-markdown/merged/guide/*.pdf deliverables
scripts.project:clone: echo 'use for a github project that needs to be cloned'
scripts.build:activity-files: npm run project:clone && npm run project:cleanup
scripts.package:activity-files: npm run build:activity-files && cd activity-files && zip -rq ../deliverables/activity-files.zip .
scripts.package:all: npm run package && npm run package:activity-files
